content:
I, #{userName}, hereby pledge to study with full focus on #{selected_days}, starting from today until #{auto_destruct}, between #{time_range}.

I will begin with #{initialFocusGoal} minutes of study each day and increase it by #{incrementFocusGoalBy} minutes daily until I reach my goal of #{finalFocusGoal} hours.

During these sessions, all apps will be blocked except the ones Iâ€™ve marked as allowed: #{unrestrictedApps}.

If I break this focus or use restricted apps, I accept the consequences set in this quest.

This is my promise to myself â€” to stay consistent, grow my discipline, and level up my brain. ğŸ“–ğŸš€
